text: hey there fellow travelers mark here
with walter's world and today we're at
my regional airport at five o'clock in
the morning and i thought i'd ask you a
question what do you prefer do you
prefer the early morning flights the
afternoon flights maybe the late night
red-eye flights what's your go-to flight
i know for me
i like just to get up it's super early
just take that shower and just suck it
up and drive the airport and fly out
first thing because then i feel that i
can get to the city early enough that
i'm going to that i can actually still
do some stuff on the day on travel so my
travel day isn't just a total like
travel wasted day i can get some stuff
in and see a few sites maybe grab a bite
or two you know a good lunch and a
dinner when i'm there but i thought i'd
ask you how do you like to do it are you
an early morning flyer or one of those
red-eye
night flights or maybe just you know i
like to wake up when i wake up and take
the noon flight so let me know in the
comments below and i wish you all a
happy travels wherever you're going
today
